allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Restructure project into monorepo with multiple apps

- Move Flutter mobile app to apps/mobile_flutter/
- Create Next.js admin API in apps/web_api/
- Create Flutter web admin UI in apps/admin_flutter_web/
- Add shared TypeScript types package in packages/shared/

## Apps Structure
- apps/mobile_flutter: Flutter mobile app \(iOS & Android\)
- apps/admin_flutter_web: Flutter web admin dashboard
- apps/web_api: Next.js admin API with Supabase integration

## Shared Package
- packages/shared: TypeScript types for user, entry, and analytics data

## Configuration Updates
- Update root README.md with monorepo structure
- Update .gitignore for Node.js and Next.js projects
- Add CI/CD workflows for each app \(flutter-mobile, flutter-web, nextjs-api, shared-package\)
- Deprecate old dart.yml workflow

## API Features
- User management endpoints \(GET/POST /api/admin/users\)
- Analytics endpoint \(GET /api/admin/analytics\)
- JWT authentication middleware
- Supabase admin client integration

## Admin Web Features
- Supabase authentication
- GoRouter navigation
- Dashboard with statistics
- User management screen \(placeholder\)
- Analytics screen \(placeholder\)
- Material Design 3 with dark mode

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
